mapper.select: SELECT RIDER.row_number,RIDER.id,RIDER.show_order,RIDER.photo_url,RIDER.name,RIDER.link_pic FROM (select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by R.ID) ROW_NUMBER,R.ID,R.SHOW_ORDER,R.PHOTO_URL,R.NAME，R.LINK_PIC from T_U_RIDER R where R.is_delete != 1 and R.is_excellent='01' ) RIDER
select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by R.ID) ROW_NUMBER,R.ID,R.SHOW_ORDER,R.PHOTO_URL,R.NAME，R.LINK_PIC from T_U_RIDER R where R.is_delete != 1 and R.is_excellent !='01' OR R.is_excellent is null

SELECT RIDER.row_number,RIDER.id,RIDER.show_order,RIDER.photo_url,RIDER.name,RIDER.link_pic FROM (select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by R.ID) ROW_NUMBER,R.ID,R.SHOW_ORDER,R.PHOTO_URL,R.NAME，R.LINK_PIC from T_U_RIDER R where R.is_delete != 1) RIDER

select ROW_NUMBER()over(order by A.ROW_NUMBER) ROW_NUMBER,A.NAME,A.LEADER_NAME,A.PHOTO_URL,A.PHONE , A.RIDER_CODE , A.RIDER_SUM,A.IS_EXCELLENT,A.IS_SHOW,A.ID,MANAGER.NAME LEVEL_NAME FROM (select ROW_NUMBER()over(order by TA.ID) ROW_NUMBER,TA.NAME,TB.NAME LEADER_NAME,TA.PHOTO_URL,TA.PHONE,TA.RIDER_CODE,TA.RIDER_SUM, TA.IS_EXCELLENT,TA.IS_SHOW,TA.ID,TA.USER_MANAGER_ROLE_ID from T_U_RIDER TA LEFT JOIN T_U_RIDER TB ON TA.LEADER_ID=TB.ID where TA.IS_DELETE!=1 )A LEFT JOIN T_S_USER_MANAGER_ROLE MANAGER ON A.USER_MANAGER_ROLE_ID = MANAGER.ID

select ROW_NUMBER()over(order by A.ROW_NUMBER) ROW_NUMBER,A.NAME,A.LEADER_NAME,A.PHOTO_URL,A.PHONE , A.RIDER_CODE , A.RIDER_SUM,A.IS_EXCELLENT,A.IS_SHOW,A.ID,MANAGER.NAME LEVEL_NAME FROM (select ROW_NUMBER()over(order by TA.ID) ROW_NUMBER,TA.NAME,TB.NAME LEADER_NAME,TA.PHOTO_URL,TA.PHONE,TA.RIDER_CODE,TA.RIDER_SUM, TA.IS_EXCELLENT,TA.IS_SHOW,TA.ID,TA.USER_MANAGER_ROLE_ID from T_U_RIDER TA LEFT JOIN T_U_RIDER TB ON TA.LEADER_ID=TB.ID where TA.IS_DELETE!=1 AND TA.ID=#{id} )A LEFT JOIN T_S_USER_MANAGER_ROLE MANAGER ON A.USER_MANAGER_ROLE_ID = MANAGER.ID

T_U_SERVICE_ITEM ITEM LEFT JOIN (SELECT RIDER_ID,SERVICE_ITEM_ID FROM T_U_RIDE_SERVICE_ITEM where IS_DELETE!=1 AND RIDER_ID = #{rider_id}) SERVICE ON ITEM.ID = SERVICE.SERVICE_ITEM_ID WHERE ITEM.IS_DELETE!=1
